name: Are shelters prepared for winter?
category: Emergency Shelter Assessment in the Middle East
why: This project helps assess whether emergency shelters are suitably prepared for winter by answering questions about a series of photographs from displacement sites in Jordan and Iraq.

questionnaire.question: Do you see shelter in this photo?
Is the shelter raised off the ground?
Does the shelter have a second cover to protect it from the rain?
Is there space to put a chimney safely inside the shelter?
